page.title: The Beginning
page.prompt:
He was a priest with no religion after his wife's death.

He had three kids. One was a little girl who left half-drunken glasses of water around the room. Another was a teenage baseball star, who was now a dropout. Finally, there was the asthmatic boy. Together, they were a family, broken but functional.

One day, his daughter told him of an alien in the pantry. What should the priest dad do?

links.link: Run out of the house screaming

page.title: The Prayer
page.prompt:
You bow down in prayer. You haven't prayed since you dropped out of the priesthood. You bow your head.

Then you feel a strange feeling on the back of your neck. What should you do?

links.link: Run out of the house screaming
